item.title: Install Homebrew Di Debian 11
item.description: Persiapan Update Debian 11: 1 2 sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade Setelah itu install package yang diperlukan sebelum menginstall Homebrew. 1 sudo apt install build-essential procps curl file git Install Homebrew Then, we can install Homebrew by executing this command which downloads and executes the installation script recommended by the developers. 1 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Setelah proses download dan instalasi selesai, akan muncul pesan Installation successful!
